title: Fingerprint Tree Thank You Gift
description: This Fingerprint Tree is the perfect Thank You gift for any teacher or school staff member!  Simply print and invite the students to add a fingerprint as a leaf on the tree.  Names could also be added onto each leaf or at the bottom of the tree.  This would make a beautiful and personalised end of year teacher gift or  Teacher Appreciation gift!  This pack includes 9 different font options to choose from. Other resources you may be interested in:First Day and Last Day of School Signs for Photos

title: Learning about Hinduism Resource Bundle
description: This Hinduism teaching bundle is an excellent resource for teaching students about Hinduism as a World Religion. Designed to foster a deep understanding of the Hindu Religion, the flipbook and writing templates empower students to embark on a captivating exploration of its core elements. From the majestic Hindu temples to the revered Hindu gods, symbolic representations, and vibrant Hindu celebrations, students will delve into the fascinating world of Hinduism. title: Learning about Buddhism Resource Bundle
description: Explore Buddhism as a World Religion with this engaging and interactive Buddhism resource bundle.  Students research various aspects of the Buddhist faith and then create their own flipbooks or collaborate with a partner to research and showcase their learning about Buddhism. The flipbook templates provide structure, guiding students through the origins, beliefs, practices, symbols, and influential figures of Buddhism. title: Learning about Islam Resource Bundle
description: Engage your students in an exploration of Islam as a World Religion with this bundle of teaching resources.  Designed to promote research and understanding, the Islam flipbook templates empower students to create their own flipbooks or collaborate with a partner to delve into the key aspects of the Islamic faith.
